text:
@CNN The number keeps going up 
Has one of these people became sick
Remember this you idiots flu season
is October-May  What did we do before 
covid19 I will tell you  NOTHING AT ALL
Did we sanitize restaurants NO
Did we sanitize Barber chairs NO
Did we sanitize anything NO
